name: Darby J. SWOYER v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board (A to Z Maintenance Corporation). Appeal of A TO Z MAINTENANCE CORPORATION

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: Darby J. SWOYER v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board (A to Z Maintenance Corporation). Appeal of A TO Z MAINTENANCE CORPORATION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Frederick W. Ulrich, Harrisburg, for A to Z Maintenance Corp.
Warren H. Prince, Bechtelsville, for D. Swoyer.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 286
Darby J. SWOYER v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Workmen’s Compensation Appeal Board (A to Z Maintenance Corporation). Appeal of A TO Z MAINTENANCE CORPORATION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 8, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
Frederick W. Ulrich, Harrisburg, for A to Z Maintenance Corp.
Warren H. Prince, Bechtelsville, for D. Swoyer.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
